Vps_CaptDssWbParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Capture API » VPS DSSWB Capture API

DSSWB parameters used in set/get DSSWB params IOCTL. More...

#include <vps_captureDssWb.h>

Detailed Description

DSSWB parameters used in set/get DSSWB params IOCTL.

Field Documentation

Fvid2_CropConfig Vps_CaptDssWbParams::inCropCfg

DSS Overlay crop config. Not valid for tda2xx Platforms. For tda3xx platform for full frame write back, height and width of crop config should be same as in inFmt

Fvid2_Format Vps_CaptDssWbParams::inFmt

width:
Input source width, video source input width. This represents width of overlay to whcih WB is connected.

height:
Input source height, MUST be >= actual or expected video source input height. This represents height of overlay to whcih WB is connected.
Height should be field height in case source is interlaced
Height should be frame height in case source is progressive

dataFormat:
Input source color data format, valid values are given below
FVID2_DF_BGR24_888.
For valid values see Fvid2_DataFormat.

scanFormat:
Input source scan format - interlaced or progressive. For valid values see Fvid2_ScanFormat.

chNum, pitch, fieldMerged, bpp: Not used, set to 0 or default.

UInt32 Vps_CaptDssWbParams::inNode

Input pipe/overlay that is connected to writeback Pipeline For valid values see Vps_DssDispcWbInNode.

Vps_CaptDssWbOutInfo Vps_CaptDssWbParams::outStreamInfo[VPS_CAPT_DSSWB_STREAM_ID_MAX]

Output format for each stream. The number of valid entries should match the numStream parameter provided at create time.

UInt32 Vps_CaptDssWbParams::wbMode

M2M Writeback or capture Writeback mode. For valid values check Vps_DssDispcWbMode.
